Interface Playable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Playable>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AI, Fighter, Player

    public interface Playable
extends java.lang.Comparable<Playable>
    Interface for fighters
    Author:
    jbacal
